casebody.data:
First District.

Loretta Schenkl, appellee, v. Sheffield Theatre Company and Essaness Theatres Corporation, appellants.Gen. No. 38,965.Heard in the first division of this court for the first district at the October term, 1936.Opinion filed June 14, 1937.McKenna, Harris & Schneider, for appellants; James J. McKenna and Abraham W. Brussell, of counsel. Francis J. Gariepy and Charles E. Mallon, for appellee; Owen Rall, of counsel. Mr. Presiding Justice Matchett

delivered the opinion of the court.
